ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( TEXT( Principal_Order__c ) == TEXT( Fees_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Principal_Order__c ) == TEXT( Insurance_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Principal_Order__c ) == TEXT( Interest_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Fees_Order__c ) == TEXT( Insurance_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Fees_Order__c ) == TEXT( Interest_Order__c ) ) || ( TEXT( Insurance_Order__c ) == TEXT( Interest_Order__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ensure each Payment element has a unique priority number between 1 and 4
